subject: Dogs
lead_paragraph: Tuesday night, Robert Indeglia, a purebred human, pointed to an English springer spaniel named James, designating him Best in Show at the Westminster’s 131st edition, at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Tuesday night, Robert Indeglia, a purebred human, pointed to an English springer spaniel named James, designating him Best in Show at the Westminster’s 131st edition, at Madison Square Garden.
